column4: what was the recommended (?) repository for bleeding-edge Wine? was it simply the WineHQ repository? (I thought it was in Ubotu, but it's not)
you can build it from CVS if you want the latest
yep i know, but i don't want to compile it, i was just positive that some sort of bleeding-edge (or recent, anyway) repository was mentioned a few times here
maybe it's this one, I don't remember -> deb http://wine.sourceforge.net/apt/ binary/
it's on the english version too, lol
well, i supposed so, but couldn't be sure, never read the english version (though i should, as i have some hundred megabytes of saved comics in english ;)
well my Debian server is downloading the new strips every night... there's a program specifically to download comics
i mean, a program in the Debian reps
it's "dailystrips" and i've found it in the ubuntu reps as well :)
i get the dilbert comic sent to my work pc everyday.
i have them on my debian
i have them on my debian's internal webserver

put them on the webserver so that the rest of my family could read them too, but they're too lazy to learn enough english to understand comics ;-\ i should find an handwriting-OCR and a decent machine translator... hey, perhaps i'll have them in 20 years or so :)
